model Module¶

Class to represent poulations data.

class model.Model(param, tracked_values=[])[source]¶

A generic class that contains a model

Parameters:
  • param (dict) – Parameters of the model. Must contain at least N, T (for Population initialisation) and c et b (cost and benfits).
  • tracked_values (list) – Values to track at each re

Example::

param = {"N":100000,
         "T":1000,
         "b":3,
         "c":1,
         "ps":0.3,
         "pa":0.1,
         "mu":0.001}
play(nb_generations)[source]¶

Initialisation and call of the main loop

step()[source]¶

Runs one generation of the model

Must be overrided by the class herited from model. Called by Population.play at each generation
